source_anchor.source_text: The policy applies to all staff and governance members of Organization (hereafter – named as Personnel).

attributes.conditional_application: depending on specific clauses and conditions of the grant agreement

source_anchor.source_text: The provisions of this policy may also be applied to partners depending on specific clauses and conditions of the grant agreement, suppliers, sub-grantees, beneficiaries, stakeholders, consultants, external executors, engaged experts, volunteers and other associated entities (hereafter – named as Representatives).

relationships.description: The policy applies to all personnel including staff and governance members
The policy provisions may also be applied to representatives depending on specific conditions
Personnel are staff and governance members of the Organization
General Meeting is directly involved in the implementation of the Policy
Executive director is directly involved in the implementation of the Policy
Partners are part of the Representatives group
Suppliers are part of the Representatives group
Sub-grantees are part of the Representatives group
Beneficiaries are part of the Representatives group
Stakeholders are part of the Representatives group
Consultants are part of the Representatives group
External executors are part of the Representatives group
Engaged experts are part of the Representatives group
Volunteers are part of the Representatives group

entities.name: Policy
entities.description: The organizational policy document that provides staff with understanding and safe working environment

attributes.purpose: provide staff with clear understanding of policies, procedures and practices and a healthy, safe working environment

source_anchor.source_text: The purpose of this Policy is to provide the staff of the Personnel and Representatives with a clear understanding of the policies, procedures and practices used by the organization and a healthy, safe working environment for staff.

entities.name: Organization

source_anchor.source_text: This document also provides an overview of how the Organization assesses, monitors and responds to security risks that may affect staff and program implementation.
